thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Atalanta's Andrea Conti targeted after scouting mission | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Atalanta's Andrea Conti targeted after scouting mission | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Atalanta's Andrea Conti targeted after scouting mission | Metro News
text:
Follow us Chelsea prepare £12.8million move for Atalanta star Andrea Conti after scouts give Antonio Conte the green light gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 7:38 am Atalanta duo Andrea Conti and Franck Kessie have both been linked with Chelsea (Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea sent scouts to watch Andrea Conti in action for Atalanta over the weekend ahead of a possible summer transfer move, reports say. 
The Blues are keen to bolster Antonio Conte’s squad at the end of the season and have already begun the process of drawing up a list of targets. 
Atalanta’s Franck Kessie has been heavily linked with a move to Stamford Bridge – and Gazzetta dello Sport say Chelsea has scouts at the Serie A club’s win over Crotone on Saturday. 
However, the Premier League leaders were watching right-back Conti rather than Ivorian star Kessie. 
Conti has flourished this season in Italy, playing 23 games to help Atalanta climb to fifth in Serie A. The Italian has also contributed four goals – including the winner against Crotone. Conti has enjoyed a productive campaign in Italy (Picture: Getty) Chelsea fixtures 
Swansea (H) – Sat 25 Feb West Ham (A) – Mon 6 Mar Watford (H) – Mon 13 Mar Stoke (A) – Sat 18 Mar Crystal Palace (H) – Sat 1 Apr Manchester City (H) – Wed 5 Apr Bournemouth (A) – Sat 8 Apr Manchester United (A) – Sat 15 Apr 
It is claimed the Blues have watched the 22-year-old on more than one occasion this term as Conte looks for reinforcements ahead of the summer.
